Repot: root pruning underneath and up the trunk possible
Pruning: refinement (post-flush harden)  May's last week/ June's first week
refinement/development when leaves change colors in fall
Wiring: strucural in fall when leaves drop or
Temperatures: likes full sun in spring and fall
shade in summer if T > 30 deg C
if T < -2 deg C, protect from cold
